1:
Hwâ netsitsɛng a ga lɔk lɔ mɛ,
a tɛ̀ sesek gacik taama na a gwɛ̌ a lɔ́k o gap.
2:
A ga yɛt banamâ yas yaga râ nzem, a ga puru nshi anap mɛ,
a ga tik pyɛ̂ re arɔng.
3:
A ga tomo behwông fwom mɛ,
be yila yi e nedem nerey ne repomo.
4:
Be tē, “Mwa wò dunus tik na a ye rɛng na mɛ!”
Na womo de a vɔk tɔ́k-tsik wɛt e ye,
5:
“Vey, na hwo re pyɛ̂ re hom
na hwo sɔ nshi anap de ma ga puru nɛ.
6:
Hala hin netɔn na yin a sè beken.
Ko yin kyè e gwông tɔ̂k pyɛ́.”
7:
Mwat de a gyong mwât tôs to bê dusa hɛ zɔng,
womo de e tabak mwat vwes bê mǎ hɛ.
8:
Hwo gyong mwat tos to wɛt, ê bɛɛ hwo ves,
gyong mwât netsitsɛng e negya, ko ê tɛ̀ yey na hwo.
9:
Masa a mwat netsitsɛng ko e gwɛ̌ netsitsɛng,
basa a mwat de a sé cik ko e gwɛsɛ ɛ masa.
10:
Sâp Dagwi Darwey ha sé mɛsɛ̂ng netsitsɛng,
ko tɔ̂k Wo Jɛrɛ he nɔng mwat tɔ́k-tsik rat.
11:
A sé netsitsɛng de nê gwɛ̌ nepɔlɔ mō,
ko yi na nɛ de neshey neken mō nê gwɛ hɛn.
12:
Ka sede hwà vɔk netsitsɛng, hwô re nerat nɛ,
ko sede hwo tos to, hwo wɛ hwô wok mɛ.
13:
Tɔ́n hwā e ra rewɔng,
dunus, vit à kyen.
14:
E sangal e rwi lɔ mɛ,
e kwɔ̂n sangal wɛshɛrɛk e ji repomo,
15:
e yishi vemo de ba sé kwey,
vemo de ba ga kaba gwong cik wɔ̂ tomong mɛn.
16:
E tē “Mwa wò dunus tik na a ye rɛng na me!”
Ko womo de vit à tɔk e yang ɛ,
17:
“Nshî kyìri ne tā,
ko pyɛ̂ re de be re e lɛrɛ ye rɔgɔm.”
18:
Ko a tɔk, bevuvwel ba sé e hwomo wɛt,
bekɛnɛt mɛ ba sé e ji neciwil sak.
